    • Uses of AI in game.AI

      Subclasses of AI in game.AI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MediumAI
      AI which tries to mimic an average player: it tries to play the minions like they are supposed to and uses minions to attack enemy influence if the turn is lethal.
      class  SimpleAI
      A very simple AI which does every move randomly.
      class  TestAI
      THIS CLASS IS FOR TESTING ONLY.
